clues.name: Pastry Crumbs
clues.description: Small pastry crumbs scattered near the dining table. They smell like strawberries and vanilla - definitely from Valentin's famous erdbeerstrudel.
clues.notebookNote: Pastry crumbs near the table - strawberry and vanilla scent

clues.name: Stained Napkin
clues.description: A crumpled napkin with red stains. Upon closer inspection, it appears to be strawberry jam. Someone wasn't very careful cleaning up.
clues.notebookNote: Napkin with strawberry jam stains - carelessly discarded

clues.name: Crossed-Out Recipe
clues.description: Scattered papers on Valentin's desk. One sheet has his erdbeerstrudel recipe with angry crossed-out notes: 'Too sweet!' and 'Needs improvement!' Someone wasn't happy with the original version.
clues.notebookNote: Recipe with critical notes - someone had strong opinions

clues.name: Hidden Gap
clues.description: A narrow gap behind the tall bookshelf. Perfect for hiding something... or for someone to slip away unnoticed. There's a faint scent of pastry lingering here.
clues.notebookNote: Hidden gap behind bookshelf - smells like pastry

clues.name: Spotless Plate
clues.description: The plate where Valentin's erdbeerstrudel was displayed. It's completely clean... suspiciously clean. Not a single crumb remains, as if someone deliberately wiped it down.
clues.notebookNote: Suspiciously clean plate - too thorough for an accident
